名称（Name） 类型（Type） 是否可选（Optional）
1 `cell` {% include href/type/node %} No
{% include href/nourl/TD %}将会被创建
2 `cellData`

Any

 No

Cell data. If you use columns.render to modify the data, use $(cell).html() to get and modify the rendered data. The information given here is the original and unmodified data from the data source.
3 `rowData`

Any

 No

Data source object / array for the whole row
4 `rowIndex`

integer

No

DataTables' internal index for the row
5 `colIndex`

integer

No

DataTables' internal index for the column
